name: Shuttle Up!
description:
A co-op multiplayer game on a spaceship. Keep repairing your ship to survive for as long as possible. Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020 under the theme "repair".

2 players are necessary to play this game.

Controls

Player 1 - W,A,S,D to move and SPACE for action.

Player 2 - Arrow keys to move and RIGHT CTRL for action.
